name: Grand Hyatt Bali

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for 10 nights of our honeymoon and we loved every minute of it! Bali is a beautiful island but we found it hard to drag ourselves away! The hotel is spread out along it's own private beach (always quiet when we were there). The whole place was spotless and staff were friendly and attentive. Our room was spacious and we received a free traditional Balinese gift every day. The free-form lagoon pool is very pretty and is surrounded by plants - we were told the hotel even has it's own eco-system. The restaurants are expensive but worth every penny. Our favourite was the Italian. The salsa cocktail bar has fabulous views and half-price drinks at sunset. There was a chocolate night every night in the lobby when we were there and it was heavenly. Stay here!
reviews.title: Peace and Tranquility in Bali

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: Wonderful hotel!
reviews.title: I like this hotel very mach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best in Nusa Dua.
reviews.title: Great stay in paradise
Best hotel on Bali
reviews.text: My English is very bad... so see my photos! :)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 10 great days on honeymoon here. It was our first time in Bali and we loved our stay at the Grand Hyatt Bali.
reviews.title: Beautiful Bali

likes.liked: — The rooms were very spacious and clean

reviews.title: "good, but not great".
reviews.text: Nusa Dua is beautiful, and the Grand Hyatt is HUGE and very beautifully presented, but I wasn't as impressed as I was expecting to be.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel and grounds itself are STUNNING. The rooms are lovely. However! After asking for a quiet room (since the last hotel we stayed in was noisey as!) we were given a room surrounded by airline crew there for a conference and were kept awake late into the night by their noise, and awoken before 7am every morning by their noise! Not the hotel's fault really, however they should never have put us there in the first place, and the rooms have nothing to absorb the noise from furniture etc (i.e. no carpet, curtains etc).
reviews.title: Outstanding hotel

likes.disliked: — Salsa Verde not as superior as other restaurants

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was ground level with a balcony with a massive koi pond (my fiance was tempted to go fishing for koi). After feeding the koi Pringles, a massive lizard swam up and gobbled the remaining bits, which was pretty cool!
reviews.title: Do Not Stay Here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What is with shutting the pool at 8pm? In Bali, people want to SWIM!! Probably would sell a lot more cocktails if it were open much later!
reviews.title: Very relaxing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food and drinks are what you would expect from a 5 star hotel, but not that great again and it just seemed to highly-priced for what you got (well, after paying on average 8,000 RP for a coke in Kuta, 30,000 seems steep, even though it's only AU$4!).
reviews.title: Good, but didnt knock my socks off

likes.disliked: — Thwy charge you for absolutely everything

reviews.title: Great holiday and resort
reviews.text: I tried to write a review on returning from the Grand Hyatt in February, but could not send it for some reason! So am trying again. We found the hotel to come up to our expectations, we have stayed at a lot of 5 star properties in Asia, and can only say the people who gave bad reviews were very unfortunate. I agree the wait on arriving for a room to be allocated really needs to be addressed. We requested a twin room and were offered a kingsize, which we did not wish to take. We were treated very curtiously and after about 30 minutes were taken to a twin room which was excellent. I feel the hotel should allocate the room when they receive the booking, and then there would not be a problem on arriving. We have booked to return to this hotel in November this year, and it would be nice if our twin room was already allocated to use before we arrive!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel grounds are stunning and great for strolling around. The staff are extremely friendly and added a nice feeling to the holiday. Regarding the Bali feel lacking at the Hyatt, maybe it would be better to book a hotel that is Balanize owened and not a international hotel, which quite often does lack the local atmosphere, but makes up in the amenities offered.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We too enjoyed the Bali collection just across the road from the Grand Hyatt, and also found the restraurants in the village to be excellent - they even sent a car to pick you up and take you back free of charge.
reviews.title: Great Holiday Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We look forward to another lovely holiday in November staying at the Grand Hyatt.
reviews.title: Great Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gorgeous Property spanning acres. The rooms are theatre sized with a lounge sitting area inclusive. There are ocean view rooms and inner-lake view rooms, both are amazing. Food is amazing at the hotel. Miles of private beach are an ideal place to have an evening dinner. A giant chessboard on the beach is a delight for the kids. Tons of sporting activities in Bali makes it a worthwhile stay. But be warned- if you forget anything in your room and you realize it at the reception- its a good 20 mins to walk back and forth!!
reviews.title: This is heaven on earth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were sure that despite poor reviews we had picked the perfect hotel for
reviews.title: Wish we had stayed elsewhere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: our 40th wedding anniversary. Oh dear we did not pick wisely. We booked
reviews.title: Not so great a place for honeymooners

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 6 months prior with room type confirmed.When we arrived at about midnight
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we were given wrong type no ocean view or day bed. We had to wait till 3am
reviews.title: All the comforts of the Hyatt - but a little distant from the real Bali.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: for ocean view room still no day bed though( hotel only half full at time). Never
reviews.title: Nice resort hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: This was lovely! We stayed 10 days at this paradise and it will definitely not be the last time. The staff is 100% dedicated. Perfect location, nice people, delicious food, real espresso and 2 very kind musicians in the lobby every night. BTW if you're looking for a driver for a short or long trip or for a day: Putu was responsible for half of the pleasure during our stay. You can contact him [-----------] and his base is outside the hotel (beach entrance of Bali Collection).
reviews.title: Heaven on earth!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: John & Family from Amsterdam, Netherlands
reviews.title: Great place - just go there!

likes.disliked: — The shower area should be enclosed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled on business
reviews.text: Our first trip to Bali so we didnt know what to expect. In short - super location, resort, facilities, outstanding design, good food, great beach. There was some renovation construction but not at all intrusive.
reviews.title: Excellent Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2006
reviews.text: The only hitch - very below average gym equipment for a 5 star.
reviews.title: Looking forward to their fully renovated rooms! Great for kids!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2005
reviews.text: Recommend you pay a few dollars extra ($25 I think) and upgrade to the Grand Hyatt Club. They serve you breakfast in the Grand Club lounge where they also serve you canapes and drinks complimentary in the evening.
reviews.title: Nice Rooms with Mediocre Service/Attitude in a Mediocre Setting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 nights in the Grand Hyatt Bali and everything went pretty well. Our room was quite big, clean and with a nice decoration. The hotel is very big as almost all hotels in Nusa Dua so expect to wait for the breakfast and do not have a seat in the pool. My only one complain is the area, Nusa Dua seems a world apart in Bali, while the island has lots of culture and you feel an indonesian flair, Nusa Dua is just a turist area where locals are not wellcomed. I would recommed Jimbaran for a better taste of the island. Although the hotel is pretty good.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a Club Garden Room. The room size was good, with large bathroom. All normal facilities for this type of hotel. The room faced man made waterway with plenty of fish and bird life.
reviews.title: great relaxing holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel has a nice beach with plenty of shade trees and large number of sun lounges. Also there are a number of pools of large size. The gardens are beautiful and well maintained. See breezes help cool you.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel with private beach

likes.liked: — Nice sized rooms with private patio touching the pool with lotus flowers and koi fish

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: As in many places in Bali technical problems occur and are not always fixed properly when you ask. Our room had no hot water in the bathroom. After 3 requests over 2 days,a service guy got warm water to flow. The explanation was lost in translation, but I think he said the pipes needed priming. Priming pipes in a 5 star hotel !! After this we had to run all hot water taps for about 10 minutes just to get lukewarm water from the hot taps. We gave up at that stage. Too hard.
reviews.title: Thoroughly disappointing for a Grand Hyatt

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: The airconditioning in the room had poor airflow and kept the room at 24 degrees. Using the controller on the wall we set 18 degrees, but it had no effect on room temperature. I assume the room controller is for show only and the hotel sets the incoming temperature regardless of what you want. You can control the fan speed, but poor flow means you need maximum fan setting anyway.
reviews.title: Nice Private Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We spent a short couple of days here. Wish it could have been longer.
reviews.title: Great hotel. Excellent service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is really large and quite well located.
reviews.title: Definitely not 5 star!!!!! In need of a refurbishment!!
Reading bad forums nearly put me off this hotel but it was GREAT.
reviews.text: We were in the Club section and the rooms were fairly nice. If you are traveling with a young child, I would recommend a room on the ground level as you can then walk to the beach or the pool.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service is really excellent. I'd read some reviews on this site where some guests had bad experiences. I guess we were fortunate. The Club lounge is great and has a really nice selection of snacks and drinks. The breakfast served there is great too. The staff at the lounge are very friendly. The lounge is surrounded by a pool with lots of fish. The staff brought my daughter some bread to feed the fish and that kept her engrossed. All on their own and without any requests from us.
reviews.title: Very Nice, But Not Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: Some of the small details really helped. The hotel has baby strollers available that one can take on loan.
reviews.title: Very happy with our stay.

aka: Grand Hyatt Bali Hotel Nusa Dua
description: Nestled within the lush tropical gardens of the 41-acre beachfront property, the Kriya Spa will, in essence, be a wellness sanctuary, offering the discerning traveler an authentic Balinese healing experience with 24 luxurious spa villas for treatments and for full day spa programs. Reflecting its name Kriya – meaning ‘ritual’ in Sanskrit – this unique Spa will celebrate authentic Balinese healing forms with treatments based on ‘wellness rituals’ to promote positive health and anti-aging through the use of natural herbs, roots and essences.
